author: cnbc.com
title: Geron reports 4Q loss
text:
MENLO PARK, Calif. (AP) _ Geron Corp. (GERN) on Friday reported a loss of $7.4 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Menlo Park, California-based company said it had a loss of 5 cents.
The drugmaker posted revenue of $191,000 in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $27.9 million, or 18 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $1.1 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Friday, the company's shares hit $3.37. A year ago, they were trading at $2.09.
